name: twitter-chinese-translator
description: Firefox extension for translating Chinese Twitter content with AI

scripts.build:firefox: vite build && node scripts/build-scripts.mjs v2 && node scripts/copy-manifest.mjs v2
scripts.build:mv3: vite build && node scripts/build-scripts.mjs v3 && node scripts/copy-manifest.mjs v3
scripts.package: npm run build:firefox && web-ext build --overwrite-dest --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir artifacts
scripts.package:mv3: npm run build:mv3 && web-ext build --overwrite-dest --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir artifacts
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
